1.text: Draw at least 1 design in your notebook.

2.text: Include 1 or more hills that are at least 6 inches (15 cm) high.

3.text: Design a method to keep your marble on the track.

4.text: Plan a way to stop your marble at the end of the track.

5.text: Make a base using the polystyrene board.

6.text: Use popsicle sticks and skewers to support your track.
6.vid: /6/65/Make a Rolling Roller Coaster Step 6 Version 2.360p.mp4

7.text: Build your track out of aluminum foil.
7.vid: /1/1c/Make a Rolling Roller Coaster Step 7 Version 2.360p.mp4

8.text: Get creative and experiment with your other materials.
8.vid: /6/65/Make a Rolling Roller Coaster Step 8 Version 2.360p.mp4

9.text: Test the track as you’re building it to make sure it works.
9.vid: /d/d2/Make a Rolling Roller Coaster Step 9 Version 2.360p.mp4

10.text: Experiment with different ways of launching your marble.
10.vid: /8/82/Make a Rolling Roller Coaster Step 10 Version 2.360p.mp4

11.text: Time how long it takes for your marble to finish the track.

12.text: Observe where the marble goes the fastest or slowest.
12.vid: /4/4d/Make a Rolling Roller Coaster Step 12 Version 2.360p.mp4

13.text: Investigate ways you could make your marble go faster.
